dcterms:description: The CSL dataset consists of 396,209 Chinese core journal papersâ€™ metadata, including titles, abstracts, keywords, disciplines, and categories. It covers journal papers published from 2010 to 2020, selected based on the Chinese Core Journal Catalog, and annotated with discipline and category labels.
